original_text: At the end of those seven days, some Jews from Asia region saw Paul in the temple. They said some bad things against Paul to the crowd. So the people became angry and they took hold of Paul.
korean_text: 그 이레가 거의 차매 아시아로부터 온 유대인들이 성전에서 바울을 보고 모든 무리를 충동하여 그를 붙들고

sentences.original_text: At the end of those seven days
some Jews from Asia region saw Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 아시아 지방에서 온 몇몇 유대인들이 바울을 보았다

sentences.original_text: They said some bad things against Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바울에 대해 나쁜 말들을 했다

sentences.original_text: and they took hold of Paul
